item.title: Microsoft Launches Node.js Tools For Visual Studio| | Zetta Pros
item.description: Microsoft Launches Node.js Tools For Visual Studio Node.js has quickly become one of the most popular platforms for writing server-side code. Windows, however, was never quite the right operating system to develop node.js applications on.
